entry.def: A matchstick is the wooden part of a match.

example.ex: Use a pointed object such as a broken matchstick.
example.tran: 用一个有尖的东西，比如折断的火柴棍。

entry.def: You can refer to something very small or thin as a matchstick.

example.tran: 双腿骨瘦如柴的孩子们

means.word_mean: 1. a short thin stick of wood used in making matches
